practice_phrases.target: I want to practise with people.

practice_phrases.known: 我想认识会说英语的人。
practice_phrases.target: I want to meet people who speak English.
People are learning as often as possible.

practice_phrases.known: 我猜人想知道怎么说这个词。
practice_phrases.target: I guess people want to know how to say this word.

practice_phrases.known: 我想和今天晚上练习的人一起学习。
practice_phrases.target: I want to learn with people who are practising this evening.

practice_phrases.known: 因为我想认识人，所以我很快就要开始说话了。
practice_phrases.target: Because I want to meet people, I'm going to start speaking soon.
